# Social App Workspace Instructions
- This is a full-stack TypeScript project with a React frontend and Node.js/Express backend.
- Use Redis Pub/Sub and WebSocket for real-time features.
- Implement user roles (Celebrity, Public), JWT/mock auth, and infinite scrolling feed.
- Prioritize responsive UI and smooth/lazy loading in the frontend.
